QuestData.Title: The Lost Advisor
QuestData.Description: You may as well assist me while you are here. I require a potion to be made, one that will set things right.$b$bI must conserve my energy until my task is finished, lest I become like these miserable wretches scrabbling at the cobblestones. There is coin in it for you, since I will not be needing it soon.$b$bThe harpies around here cannot resist cliffthorn. It is what drew them to Tel'anor in the first place. $b$bYou should find plenty just outside this building.
QuestData.CompletionText: <Thaedris seems lost in thought as he gazes towards the city of Suramar.>
QuestData.RewardText: <Thaedris stirs from his thoughts as you approach.>$b$bThese will be sufficient, $r.$b$b Cliffthorn is a deadly poison, and will be perfect for my needs.
